verbs.description: Journalists [V: are] freaking out over an alleged admission by Donald Trump that he attacks the press simply to “ discredit ” reporters and so that “ no one will believe you . ” CBS This Morning , CNN , ABC ’s The View and MSNBC have all fretted over the quote .
